channel.title: Portfolio on Edward Joesoef

item.title: Edward Blog
item.description:
This entire website represents my inaugural project, which I embarked upon after a prolonged hiatus due to unforeseen circumstances that arose during my professional and personal life.

Initially, my objective was to design the website with simplicity in mind, prioritizing ease of maintenance. I intend to implement incremental improvements periodically, adhering to the principles of agile development.
